properties.description: From the beginning of November to the end of March, the Breakfast Club is open every Monday, 9am -12pm. Everyone is welcome. We offer a warm welcome, good company and free tea, coffee, cereals, toast and bacon rolls. We have a free community book and DVD exchange and can sign post to other local groups and services.
properties.title: Alburgh Breakfast Club

properties.address: Diss Library, Church Street, Diss, Diss, Norfolk IP22 4DD

properties.title: Diss Library

properties.description: A friendly space for a chat and a coffee (and cake!) All are welcome to come and enjoy. No charge made for refreshments though donations are welcome for charity.

properties.description: Coffee and Cake: Drop in on your own or with a friend at any time between 10 and 11.30 for FREE coffee/tea and cake with table service. Lively conversation, or quiet table if preferred. A few books available to browse or borrow. Also 'Coffee, Craft & Chat: Get crafty and creative over a cuppa – bring a project with you. Make some new friends whilst you’re ‘making.
